mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item(category_id, item_sell_status, item_gubun, item_name, price, stock_number, item_detail) VALUES (#{categoryId}, #{itemSellStatus}, #{itemGubun}, #{itemName}, #{price}, #{stockNumber}, #{itemDetail})
mapper.update: UPDATE item SET category_id = #{categoryId}, item_sell_status = #{itemSellStatus}, item_gubun = #{itemGubun}, item_name = #{itemName}, price = #{price}, stock_number = #{stockNumber}, item_detail = #{itemDetail} WHERE item_id = #{itemId}
mapper.select: SELECT i.item_id, i.category_id, i.item_sell_status, i.item_gubun, i.item_name, i.price, i.stock_number, i.item_detail, i.dc_rate, i.regdate, i.moddate FROM item i WHERE item_id = #{itemId}
SELECT i.item_id, i.category_id, i.item_sell_status, i.item_gubun, i.item_name, i.price, i.stock_number, i.item_detail, i.dc_rate, i.regdate, i.moddate FROM item i
SELECT i.item_id, i.category_id, i.item_sell_status, i.item_gubun, i.item_name, i.price, i.stock_number, i.item_detail, i.dc_rate, i.regdate, i.moddate FROM item i WHERE i.category_id = #{categoryId}

SELECT i.item_id, i.category_id, i.item_sell_status, i.item_gubun, i.item_name, i.price, i.stock_number, i.item_detail, i.dc_rate, i.regdate, i.moddate FROM item i WHERE i.item_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchTerm}, '%')

SELECT i.item_id, i.category_id, i.item_sell_status, i.item_gubun, i.item_name, i.price, i.stock_number, i.item_detail, i.dc_rate, i.regdate, i.moddate FROM item i WHERE i.item_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchTerm}, '%') OR i.item_detail LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchTerm}, '%')

SELECT i.item_id, i.category_id, i.item_sell_status, i.item_gubun, i.item_name, i.price, i.stock_number, i.item_detail, i.dc_rate, i.regdate, i.moddate FROM item i WHERE i.price BETWEEN #{minPrice} AND #{maxPrice}

SELECT i.item_id, i.category_id, i.item_sell_status, i.item_gubun, i.item_name, i.price, i.stock_number, i.item_detail, i.dc_rate, i.regdate, i.moddate FROM item i WHERE i.item_sell_status = #{itemSellStatus}
SELECT i.item_id, i.category_id, i.item_sell_status, i.item_gubun, i.item_name, i.price, i.stock_number, i.item_detail, i.dc_rate, i.regdate, i.moddate FROM item i WHERE i.item_gubun = #{itemGubun}
